name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Netizen contribution
In order to meet the assessment and avoid falling back into poverty, Guang'an City, Sichuan Province, has adopted the measure of apportionment. All department staff are forced to purchase high-priced agricultural and sideline products from poor households every month according to their level, under the euphemism of consumer assistance.
However, poor households do not have many agricultural and sideline products at home, so they can only go to the market to purchase them and then resell them to civil servants.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Recently, in Harbin, a man posted a video saying that he had just deposited 6,000 yuan in China Everbright Bank and wanted to transfer it to his elderly for medical treatment, but the bank told him that there was a problem with the system and the money would not be credited to his card until three days later.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: The Shanghai Stock Exchange and the Shenzhen Stock Exchange issued an announcement stating that starting from August 19, the data on "northbound funds" will no longer be disclosed in real time on a daily basis, but will be published quarterly. Some people believe that northbound funds have a huge impact on A-shares, and no longer disclosing them in real time will help stabilize investor confidence.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Starting from August 19, the northbound funds will be announced quarterly instead of daily. Investors will not be able to easily know the flow of foreign investment funds in A-shares.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the afternoon of August 19, during a Chinese news program on Japan's NHK International Broadcasting, a 40-year-old Chinese male anchor suddenly deviated from the original script and said "Diaoyu Islands are Chinese territory" after reporting the news that "Yasukuni Shrine was graffitied in Chinese again", causing an uproar. Currently, the male anchor's contract has been terminated.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: August 19, Qingdao, Shandong. Lawyer Lan Qingzhou reported Shandong Justice Director Yang Zengsheng and Qingdao Justice Bureau Director Deng Huanli by real name. Lan Qingzhou said that after their law firm submitted a "Legislative Proposal on Abolishing the Crime of Picking Quarrels and Provoking Trouble" to the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress last year, the Qingdao Justice Bureau ordered the law firm to suspend business for rectification at the end of June this year. Lawyer Yu Kai of the law firm was also retaliated against by the Qingdao Justice Bureau for repeatedly reporting the Qingdao Justice Bureau to higher authorities.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: August 16, Jinan, Shandong. A father and his child were picking up rags on the street. The father said that he was an emergency doctor and had saved many lives in his career, but now his child was ill and he was helpless. "Usually, the child would pick up some things when he went out, and buy some steamed buns to eat." A kind person bought some food for the child. The father said, "We also want to get something delicious for the child, but there is no way, we have to see the child first."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On August 18, in Zigong, Sichuan, a woman committed suicide by jumping into the river at Qinglong Reservoir with her two children. According to people familiar with the matter, the eldest son was 4 years old and the youngest was only 2 months old. They committed suicide due to family conflicts. Before their death, they wandered around the reservoir for nearly 3 hours without saying goodbye to their family.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the 19th, the Supreme People's Court and the Supreme People's Procuratorate issued the "Interpretation on Several Issues Concerning the Applicable Laws in Handling Criminal Cases of Money Laundering", which clearly listed "virtual asset transactions" as one of the methods of money laundering.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On August 19, two men in Zhoukou, Henan Province were detained for catching 44 geckos. Police: catching one is illegal, catching more than 20 can be a criminal case, and catching more than 100 is a particularly serious case. According to the report, geckos are "three-protected" wild animals in China and have medicinal value in traditional Chinese medicine.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Water situation in Jianchang County, Liaoning Province, on August 20. Video shows that the accumulated water has approached the roof, and some trapped residents sent trembling messages asking for help. It is reported that most areas of Jianchang County have lost power and communications, and some roads leading to towns have been damaged.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Some netizens' comments on the game "Black Myth: Wukong"

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: In 2022, Henan was exposed to have the health codes of many rights-defending depositors "turned red". The official involved, Feng Xianbin, executive deputy secretary of the Zhengzhou Municipal Party Committee, was dismissed, and his deputy Zhang Linlin was demoted. However, an article recently published by the Zhengzhou Municipal People's Government has once again attracted attention to Zhang Linlin, who had disappeared from the public eye. At this time, she has served as the party secretary of the Zhengzhou Municipal Bureau of Culture, Radio, Film and Tourism. In response to this, netizens replied, "Cadres who have taken the blame for their leaders are all good cadres."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the evening of August 19, in Haikou, Hainan, a new energy car rushed into the crowd on the Civilization Overpass, injuring many people at the scene.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On August 15, the Hong Kong-based South China Morning Post reported that more and more African students have decided to choose China as their study destination because tuition fees and living costs are affordable and scholarships are easy to obtain. They may become a group of influential people in the future to support China and its activities.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On August 19, "NetEase Cloud Music crashed" became a hot search topic, with many users reporting that they could not play songs. NetEase's technical staff said that due to technical failures and cost-cutting and efficiency-enhancing measures, they were short of manpower and spent half a day troubleshooting the problem.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: August 19 (Released) Yingkou, Liaoning. A netizen said that he wanted to go to the toilet in Chentun Town Government because he was in a hurry, but was blocked by a shirtless uncle at the door.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: August 19, Shanghai. A netizen submitted an article saying that he rented a house in Pudong New Area. The local police station knocked on doors in every household in the area, distributed anti-fraud leaflets, and counted the number of people and names in each household. "We rented a house together at the time. The police knocked on the door and specifically asked if the phone was an Apple phone. If it was, they asked us to replace it as much as possible."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: August 18, Shanxi. A couple performed acrobatics on the roadside. The man wrapped the steel bars around the woman's neck again and again. The woman's face turned red, but she cooperated despite the pain. The onlookers did not smile, but looked at them with worry. This scene resonated with many netizens.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On August 19, in Jining, Shandong, a man with dishevelled hair and a big belly sat on a park bench. A kind-hearted person bought some food for the man. Some netizens said that he had ascites and would not live long.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On the evening of August 19, in Chengdu, Sichuan, the urban management officers near Xihanggang Street drove away street vendors. A vendor stood on the roof of the urban management law enforcement vehicle to protest, and a large number of onlookers gathered around.
